channel.title: So I can't play Half Halo COD???
channel.description:
You know I like video games, But I'm not a person to like games JUST because it's from "this or that" I like to play games because they are fun, Maybe it's the community, maybe the challenge, the options or just because some are FUN.
Anyway I remember playing Half life as a young kid, I remember playing Half Life deathmatch along with Counter Strike, Sven COOP and old school Team Fortress. Then I can remember playing Halo at a friends house, loving it and playing that.
Skip a few years and Halo 2 comes out, It isn't amazing but it's Xbox Live gold. I lose a PC to use and I pretty much convert to Halo 2 online, Meet friends online (such as with PC online).
Well after a few years I pretty much moved to Xbox, Even when I have the money for a good PC it always goes towards other things, as much as it's on my mind.
As of now I mostly play Halo, Gears, COD, Half Life 2 on Xbox and Skyrim. (I like keeping to a few instead of 10000 at once) So hey maybe I'm a "Casual" or whatever but my question is?
Why is it that to some I'm automatically some "newb/peon/dumbass" because I play other games other then PC games, or Halo or Gears because SOMEHOW Halo and Gears can never get along with Half Life -__-
And remember I have played Half Life, Way before Halo was an idea, All it's side games (Opposing Force, Blue Shift, Other mods as well). And I like them all.
Anyway Half Life and Halo are my two favorite FPS series of all time, I have tried others however those two are pretty much the best I have tried. And honestly instead of fighting one another we should join. We have more in common then some of us would like to think.

item.title: So I can't play Half Halo COD???
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
tonkat:

well i guess the OP didnt state he couldnt play BF so it almost fits the topic.

though on topic. Halo 4 is announced for a 3 part series (well known), officially leaving the first 3 (from what i could take from the oh so short article.)

just wonder how 343 Industries will show a new lead to Bunjee’s series.

hopefully all the flood is detonated and a new horde like enemy of equal size can sufficiently piss me off once more.

From the sounds of official announcements/ rumors, the game sounds like it’s going to be way more open ended gameplay wise… maybe something more similar to ODST’s open world. I fucking hope so.

Also, it’s “Bungie” >.>

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: tonkat
item.description:
Maxx Skywalker:

‘You know what guys, TF2 is an awesome game, but you know what’ll make it better? Hats. That’s right, and we can charge people for them too!’

wait. im pretty sure i can do a cod version of that.

‘You know what guys, CoD was a pretty good title, but you know what’ll make it better? Xbox and map packs!, people wont play them and we don’t have to worry about PC, we can just port. also we can charge people for them too!’

item.title: So I can't play Half Halo COD???
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
Nerdguy:

And hats

Someone must’ve said something like that for TF2 that Valve ended up taking it seriously.

‘You know what guys, TF2 is an awesome game, but you know what’ll make it better? Hats. That’s right, and we can charge people for them too!’

@6Sigma: I just think you over-analyze everything. Your posts exude intelligence, but lack common sense. Oftentimes I find you have a tendency to be presumptuous, whilst regularly misinterpreting what has been stated. Correcting grammatical errors on an internet forum doesn’t help your case either.

item.title: So I can't play Half Halo COD???
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
xalener:

I want Halo and battlefield combined. Seriously. BF’s player count and map size. Halo’s health, weapon (weapon style, because it’s current set isn’t enough for that scale), and Halo’s vehicles… and first person driving. In a ghost. Fucking hell <3

Disturbulator:

Add in Need For Speed -esque vehicles with Split Second styled destructable scenery and I’m in.

Plus C4

And hats

item.source: So I can't play Half Halo COD???

item.title: So I can't play Half Halo COD???
item.dc:creator: 6Sigma
item.description:
Anyone else pissed that halo 3 never ported to PC? I’m thinking logical progression here (Halo 1, 2 both ported, 2 being the redheaded stepchild) and Microsoft’s bloodlust for global income at an unlimited rate. But no. And since I refuse to buy a console to play what would look, load, play, and mod better on PC, I guess I’m stuck.
While discussing mashups of games that don’t exist, may I suggest the 1.6 version of a mod called “Missing Information”, a tidy 500 meg addon to your current steam install that adds a bunch of weapons, and delineates the current HL2 storyline from what we all accept as it’s reality. It features entire levels and demos only shown at E3. It’s a ‘5K fun-run’, and weapon/enemy balancing needs some work, but it sure is fun blasting zombies and combine with a feckin’ OICW. Or a GODDAMNED SNIPER RIFLE.
I did a playthrough on Doom 3 last week though, it’s better than I remember. If you can bite back your laughter at NPC’s angular, polygonal skulls you’ll be just fine. Also, Flood=Trite’s! The crawling-on-the-floor-en-masse enemies so generic and overused that they’re called…“Trite’s”! Yee-haw!

Read full topic
